translations.oitc.game.description:
&eOne In The Chamber is an intense combat mode, 
&ewhere precision and strategy are key. 
&ePrepare to shoot and dodge 
&ein this exciting mini-game!
translations.random.kill.message.2: &c{%playerName} &cis known as Mr. Massacre for their &6{%kills}&c kills
translations.random.kill.message.3: &aWow, {%playerName}&a deserves an award, their &e{%kills}&a kills aren't for free...
translations.random.kill.message.4: &6Hey {%playerName}&6, I dare you to get &f{%kills}&6 more kills!
